description: His cruise ship collided with a small boat carrying South Korean tourists in Budapest.
title: Danube boat accident: Cruise ship captain goes on trial
title_page: Danube boat accident: Cruise ship captain goes on trial - BBC News
maintext: On the opening day of the trial, the prosecution argued that the captain was "distracted for personal reasons" during the crucial first five minutes after his ship, the Viking Sigyn, left its mooring. It also alleged no attempt was made to make radio contact with the smaller boat, and that no alarm signal to other ships was given.
